net.morbz.osmonaut.geometry

Class Bounds

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.morbz.osmonaut.geometry.Bounds

  • public class Bounds
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a bounding box of latitude and longitude coordinates.
    Author:
    MorbZ

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bounds()
      Creates an empty, uninitialized bounding box.
      Bounds(double lat1, double lat2, double lon1, double lon2)
      Creates a bounding box with the given bounds.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      void extend(Bounds bounds)
      Extends the bounding box to include the given bounding box.
      void extend(LatLon latlon)
      Extends the bounding box to include the given coordinate.

      double getMaxLat() 
      double getMaxLon()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bounds

        public Bounds()
        Creates an empty, uninitialized bounding box.

      • Bounds

        public Bounds(double lat1,
              double lat2,
              double lon1,
              double lon2)
        Creates a bounding box with the given bounds. The order of the coordinates doesn't matter.
        Parameters:
        lat1 - The first latitude
        lat2 - The second latitude
        lon1 - The first longitude
        lon2 - The second longitude

    • Method Detail

      • extend

        public void extend(LatLon latlon)
        Extends the bounding box to include the given coordinate.
        Parameters:
        latlon - The coordinate

      • extend

        public void extend(Bounds bounds)
        Extends the bounding box to include the given bounding box.
        Parameters:
        bounds - The bounding box

      • getCenter

        public LatLon getCenter()
        Returns:
        The center of this bounding box or null if the bounding box has not been initialized

      • contains

        public boolean contains(LatLon latlon)
        Parameters:
        latlon - The coordinate
        Returns:
        True if the given coordinate is within the bounds

      • getMinLat

        public double getMinLat()
        Returns:
        The minimal latitude or 0 if the bounding box has not been initialized

      • getMaxLat

        public double getMaxLat()
        Returns:
        The maximal latitude or 0 if the bounding box has not been initialized

      • getMinLon

        public double getMinLon()
        Returns:
        The minimal longitude or 0 if the bounding box has not been initialized

      • getMaxLon

        public double getMaxLon()
        Returns:
        The maximal longitude or 0 if the bounding box has not been initialized

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
